item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "At one magical instant in your early childhood, the page of a book—that string of confused, alien ciphers—shivered into meaning. Words spoke to you, gave up their secrets; at that moment, whole universes opened. You became, irrevocably, a reader." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "Books may not change our suffering, books may not protect us from evil, books may not tell us what is good or what is beautiful, and they will certainly not shield us from the common fate of the grave. But books grant us myriad possibilities: the possibility of change, the possibility of illumination." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "In a library, no empty shelf remains empty for long." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "Every reader exists to ensure for a certain book a modest immortality. Reading is, in this sense, a ritual of rebirth." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "But at night, when the library lamps are lit, the outside world disappears and nothing but the space of books remains in existence. " -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "In the light, we read the inventions of others; in the darkness we invent our own stories. " -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "Readers, censors know, are defined by the books they read." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "At night, here in the library, the ghosts have voices." -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Alberto Manguel
item.description: "In my fool hardy youth, when my friends were dreaming of heroic deeds in the realms of engineering and law, finance and national politics, I dreamt of becoming a librarian. " -- Alberto Manguel

item.title: Elvira add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket
